r.s: The source code for the PEAR website: go-pear.phar/install-pear-nozlib.phar
r.d: Separate sub-package just for the .phars, to cut down significantly on the size of the pearweb package
r.n: Fix notices in the phar Update go-pear to include Structures_Graph as a core package Update go-pear to include setting temp_dir/download_dir
